author: davidbau
msg: Added BindingProperty.toString, and fixed the root-element binding case in
the start-from-both binder, so that uniqueness of Java class bindings isn't
enforced for the top-level element case.

author: zieg
msg: fix bug in marshalling -- needs reworking in a larger context
modify test case to test fix

author: cezar
msg: Added support for XML Catalog, based on Apache Commons CatalogResolver.
1) there is a global read only resolver that can be set through "xmlbean.entityResolver" system property
2a) - the switch "-catalog [file]" is used on the command line for scomp
2b) - or a resolver is set in XmlOptions (XmlOptions.setEntityResolver() )

author: pcal
msg: fix unexpected end-of-file problem in JarredTylar

author: pcal
msg: add MethodName to bts, change schema, update compilers/runtime/tests
also fix problem with output in JDClassLoaderFactory
